parser.description: Full qualified name of class parser used to convert an event into an business object.

filter.description: Full qualified name of class filter used to filter events before writing.

formatter.description: Full qualified name of class formatter used to format data output.

dataWritingListeners.description: Full qualified name of the class that will listen events when writing data.

metadata.description: A key-value hash <string, string> in order to exchange metadata between configurations (main, inputs and outputs).

file.description: The output path where file will be saved.

append.description: Whether to append content to output file or not.

useBuffer.description: Whether to use buffering in order to improve writing process. You might need some times to get data put to file instantly though.

encoding.description: Force writing UTF-8 to output file.
